column5: Looking for some info on this outfitter and Lake Opasatika. It is near Kapuskasing..Any help would be appriciated ..thank you

Found this thread via a search and thought it was funny since I was just looking into that lodge and the lake about a minute ago.Not much information about them. I can't even find any lodges on Opasatika. Rufus Lake looks really interesting to me as well. I always assumed the area around Hearst/Kapuskasing would provide a fly-in experience but at a drive in lodge.Anyway, sorry to necro this old thread.Cheers.
Ironically enough I've fished it a few times as I used to live in Kap. Lots of locals fish it. It's okay but there's way better options.
Thanks for the info. I have been wondering about that lake for over a year. Good to clear that up.Cheers.
